HIV infected patients. Age of the population study is between (30-73) years and therefore concerns adults.

Ce médicament se prend par voie orale. Il arrive directement dans l'estomac et on considère donc un modèle à un compartiment. Son élimination se fait principalement par le foie des patients et est considérée comme linéaire.

This medicine is administred only orally. A one-compartment model with first-order absorption from the gastrointestinal tract fitted the data appropriately. Its elimination is mostly done by the patients' liver and is considered linear.
